## Facade.webpackConfig property

Modify the generated webpack config prior to compilation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
webpackConfig: config;
```

## Remarks

Override generated webpack config with custom config.

## Example


```ts
app.config({entry: './src/index.js'})
```
